post_detail.title: Chevy Sonic
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

I collaborated with the tech director on this project. I set up the baseline site architecture in Codeigniter so that the data services were in place, including ensuring that the like-gate was working, environment switching was functioning and the flash movie was properly loading and authenticating on Facebook.

Execution:

ClickFire Media was challenged by Big Fuel to create a unique car customizer Facebook app for their client, Chevrolet, in order to promote the Sonic car line. The app allows users to decorate and customize a Chevy Sonic car. The user begins by selecting a background or uploading their own. They can select the car’s color, and add car “wraps,” decals, window tints and wheels. Users also had the option to touch-up and/or paint their own patterns and decals. After the user creates their car, they can save their image to a gallery. Viewers can also browse through the gallery and rate the submitted customized cars. Each image is also fully shareable on Facebook, Twitter and email.
